text: Esther Vergeer, defended her 2009 title, after a win against Daniela Di Toro 6–0, 6–0 in the final. ==Seeds== # Esther Vergeer (Champion) # Sharon Walraven (Semifinals) ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==Other websites== * Official site of US Open Wheelchair Women's Singles pl:US Open 2010#Gra pojedyncza kobiet na wózkach
